name: elmSeed
description: A connect the dots game with seeds

scripts.dev: npm run live & npm run css-watch
scripts.add-bundle-changes: git add . && git commit -m 'prepare bundle' && git push origin gh-deploy
scripts.gh-pages-push: git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-publish: git checkout gh-deploy && git merge master && npm run make-elm && npm run css && npm run add-bundle-changes && npm run gh-pages-push

author: Andrew MacMurray
